subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Television
lead_paragraph: United States military personnel, who were resigned to missing the World Cup on bases and ships around the world, will apparently be able to watch the games after all through the intervention of the media magnate Rupert Murdoch.
snippet: United States military personnel, who were resigned to missing the World Cup on bases and ships around the world, will apparently be able to watch the games after all through the intervention of the media magnate Rupert Murdoch.
